description: Bicycling ranks among the most popular and enjoyable exercises on today's fitness scene-not to mention one of the most effective. Some quality time spent on a bicycle can build your muscles, boost your stamina and burn your calories to optimum effect. Yet in today's busy world, not everyone has the time to take off cross country on their trusty bicycle; or, for that matter, even across the neighborhood. This is why the elliptical bike-a stationary exercise bicycle-is becoming an increasingly popular example of superior exercise equipment for home-or even the office!

Among elipticals under $300, the Electronic Smart Mini Exercise Bike is the best fitness elliptical; a high tech, low impact stamina elliptical that can be custom tailored to your personal exercise regime. This stationary sitting bike can be-depending on your individual needs-upright or recumbent, manual or automatic. The manual setting of this compact miniature bike permits you to adjust your personal time and speed. Auto, meanwhile, features five preset workout programs. The pedals of this inmotion bike run clockwise and counter-clockwise, and can be set to ramp, rolling, mountain or valley. It also features a detachable LCD display handheld controller with LED backlight, allowing you to see your current speed, distance, the time you have invested in your exercise regime, and even the number of calories you have burnt for each individual exercise session. And it comes complete with an unbeatable resistance range.

Yet the versatility and flexibility of this elliptical exercise machine is not limited to its settings and capabilities. Like the best elliptical machines, this single stationary bike can serve as a home elliptical machine or an office elliptical-a stellar example of exercise equipment for desk. You can work out as you work-or, for that matter, as you're watching TV, cooking, or listening to music at home. Perfect for an office workout, this bike is also an ideal example of exercise equipment that will fit in nicely with desks home office. Indeed, the bike even qualifies as an under desk elliptical, as it will fit beneath your work table!

As an added bonus, this is a portable elliptical trainer that is lightweight and easy to carry-even coming complete with a convenient carrying handle. Carry it with your briefcase to work or your gym bag to your place of residence. Take this amazing elliptical trainer portable with you when you travel, as this compact elliptical can go with you everywhere. And enjoy the ride!
